duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service and problem resolution for inbound and outbound communications.
Maintain accurate and timely handling of customer inquiries, account maintenance, and transactions.
Conduct needs assessment and introduce products and services suitable to customer needs.
Promote seamless transition back to the designated dealer.
Keep abreast of changes in policy and procedures to ensure compliance with high-risk processes.

education_certification.credential: HS Diploma or GED. College degree or equivalent work experience preferred.
